creator: pierre.queinnec@zenika.com
text:
Created attachment 24387
Proposed diff

Hi, we (Zenika, http://www.zenika.com) would like to contribute a Groovy
PreProcessor, PostProcessor, Listener and Assertion. Don't hesitate to tell me
if we need to iterate on the patch. Thanks a lot!

creator: pierre.queinnec@zenika.com
text: FYI, there's also a Sampler in the patch actually.

Thanks for the contribution, however:

Groovy is already supported by the BSF test elements, and the next release of JMeter will include JSR-223 (javax.script) support, so there's no need to have separate Groovy test elements.
creator: sebb@apache.org
